TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridPattern/GridPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述
客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

related.span: 实现 UI 自动化 Grid 控件模式

span.span: Implementing the UI Automation Grid Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnCount As Integer
public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of columns in a grid.
The total number of columns in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏的行和列（具体取决于提供程序实现）可能在 UI 自动化树中加载，因此将反映在 和 属性中。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the UI Automation tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果尚未加载隐藏的行和列，则不会对其进行计数。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they are not counted. 默认值为 0。The default value is 0. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，为网格结构更改（如要在网格中添加或删除的行或列网格项）设置事件侦听器。In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowCount As Integer
public: property int RowCount { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
The total number of rows in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏的行和列（具体取决于提供程序实现）可能在 UI 自动化树中加载，因此将反映在 和 属性中。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the UI Automation tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果尚未加载隐藏的行和列，则不会对其进行计数。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. 默认值为 0。The default value is 0. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，为网格结构更改（如要在网格中添加或删除的行或列网格项）设置事件侦听器。In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid.
